about_the_game:
In this singleplayer mining adventure, you explore procedurally generated, wondrous caves. Bring your excavated treasures safely back to the surface and sell them to the local merchant, or use them to upgrade and customize your hammers at the blacksmith.
Your hammers are an integral part of the game. Not only will you use them to defend yourself in the underground and overcome boss battles, you also need them to excavate treasures inside a mining minigame. So choose wisely which hammers you take down there.



In the world of Glintseeker Island, you are the Glintseeker on the quest to uncover the island's long-buried secrets. You start off with only your trusty pickaxe at your hands, and expand your arsenal of hammers to help you make your way through the caves of Glint Mountain. If you're lucky, you might even find legendary hammers and artefacs on your journey! But rest assured, you will need all the help you can get to overcome the mysterious threat from below!



Key Aspects
  • explore randomly generated dungeons
  • find legendary hammers and upgrade and customize them
  • fight enemies and engaging boss battles
  • excavate countless treasures in a strategic mining minigame
  • solve puzzles and uncover the lore of the island
[/p][/*][/list]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K | Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 480, 4 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows Soundcard

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 | Intel Core i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8GB or Intel Arc A750, 8GB
